name: update_from_json
description: Provides MiHSEF server admin utilities. Commands: `!mihsef snapshot` to export roles/categories/channels/overwrites to JSON, and `!mihsef update_from_json` to preview and apply updates from a snapshot file.
author: MiHSEF
install_msg: Loaded. Use `!mihsef snapshot` to create a JSON backup and `!mihsef update_from_json` to apply one.
end_user_data_statement: This cog writes and reads guild structure metadata (IDs, names, permissions) to/from JSON for backup and migration by server admins. It does not store or transmit end-user personal data.
